text_block_list.text:
I don't know whether I should tend
to her or push her through it…
I decided to focus  on healing her injury.

But <chrname> couldn't move her body, and
she felt a little down…

There's no time to stand still! I've decided
to be tough on <chrname>.

But as a result, she pushed herself too
hard, and her injury worsened…

Then, miraculously, her injury healed
completely, and practice went well!
